intro: Ourisia colensoi, commonly known as the Colenso's ourisia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its compact, low-growing habit. The plant features small, tubular flowers that are typically greenish-yellow in color, arranged in dense clusters. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or sandy habitats. Due to its ornamental value and unique appearance, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
